data.md:MetaData: Lithology of sediment core FIGUEIRA, Figueira de Baixo, Portugal

North-East margin of the mire. Local vegetation: Molinio-Agrostion wet prairie. Core diameter: 6 cm. Area: 5 ha. Rice field on backswamp fen mire. Physiography: perimarine backswamp fluvial mire. Surrounding vegetation: Halimietalia com. dwarf shrubland.
Ecologia histórica da paisagem do Noroeste Alentejano
